article_title: Alba Botanica, Avalon Organics & JASÖN launch charitable products for CARE
article_text: Christia M. Torres believes in the inner beauty of a woman but also feels there's always a reason to enhance it and express your beauty. As a self taught nail artist and lover of all things glitter, Christia is always on the cutting edge of the newest and latest products for women of all ages. Embrace your beauty and don't be afraid to sparkle! Christia can be reached at chrism.photography@ymail.com or through Facebook (Christia Michelle Torres Arce) or Twitter (christiasfotos). For a helping of random musings you can also follow Christia's blog XOXO, Christia at xoxochristia.wordpress.com.

For a helping of random musings you can also follow Christia's blog XOXO, Christia at xoxochristia.wordpress.com.
Christia M. Torres believes in the inner beauty of a woman but also feels there's always a reason to enhance it and express your beauty.
Christia can be reached at chrism.photography@ymail.com or through Facebook (Christia Michelle Torres Arce) or Twitter (christiasfotos).
As a self taught nail artist and lover of all things glitter, Christia is always on the cutting edge of the newest and latest products for women of all ages.
Embrace your beauty and don't be afraid to sparkle!
